short.ar: جهاز تنقية الشبكة الذي يقوم تلقائيًا بتصفية المحتوى الذي لا ترغب في عرضه، مثل الإعلانات والمواد الإباحية والمحتوى العنيف، ويعمل…
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: A network purifier that will filters content you don't want to view, such as advertisements, pornography, and violent content.
short.de: Internet Purifier filtert automatisch Inhalte, die Sie nicht sehen wollen, wie z.B.: Werbung, Pornographie, gewalttätige Inhalte,…
short.es: Un purificador de red que filtra automáticamente el contenido que no desea ver, como anuncios, pornografía y contenido violento, y…
short.fr: Un purificateur de réseau qui filtre automatiquement le contenu que vous ne souhaitez pas voir, tel que les publicités, la…
short.ja: 広告、ポルノ、暴力的なコンテンツなど、見たくないコンテンツを自動的にフィルタリングし、ネットワークの健全性を守るネットワーク ピュリファイアです。
short.ko: 광고, 음란물, 폭력적인 콘텐츠 등 보고 싶지 않은 콘텐츠를 자동으로 필터링하고, 네트워크 건강 지킴이 역할을 해주는 네트워크 정화기입니다.
short.ru: Очиститель сети, который автоматически фильтрует контент, который вы не хотите просматривать, такой как реклама, порнография и…
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 网络净化器，自动过滤你不想查看的内容，如：广告、色情、暴力内容，网络健康守卫者。

long.ar,de,es,fr,ru:
Block sites, protect your time with site blocker! Website blocker and password protection help you stay focused.

Block Site is one of the best productivity tools available to help people procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You’ll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. 

Block disturbing websites easily and Stay focused. This Block Site & Stay Focused extension allows you to block any website. Please note that, the extension blocks the whole domain. When you want to take a break you may deactivate the blocking easily for all blocked sites.

Want to know how to block a website? 
We’ve got you covered! Just add websites to your block list  and we’ll do the rest, we’ll even throw in some really funny images if you try and go on the sites while they’re blocked

Stay Focused Extension
You can now remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them while you need to stay in the zone  and be productive. You can even set yourself a focus timer and make sure you keep on track throughout the day while at work or school.

Focus Mode
The focus mode timer feature enables you to control your schedule via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your tasks into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes followed by a short break. With ‘Focus Mode’ you can set times when to disable websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary. 

Block by words
Keyword Blocker that allows you to define a list of forbidden words that, when used, will block the content (discussion, comment, poll, etc.) This extension will soon be able to be used for blocking triggers or avoiding spoilers.

Password Protection
If you’ve blocked an app or a website you can unlock it with a passcode of your choosing, making it that bit harder to procrastinate. You can also password protect the options page to keep you from easily removing sites from your list.

Adult Content
Ever wondered how to block adult content on your device? Well now you can...easily! With the built in adult blocker that blocks all known adult sites by default making sure that you don’t see any inappropriate content.

Site blocker may also come in handy if you don`t want to be annoyed by a certain website. In that case you just block site and forget about it. The extension is a real productivity tool that denies access to websites you don`t want to see.
Surf the internet safely!

Safer browsing and digital protection just got stronger with our brand new dashboard. Track all things internet safety in one place.

With our BlockSite you’ll: 
- See in real time harmful sites that were blocked
- Suspicious emails you received
- If your online activities are being tracked
- If your personal information was leaked.
Stay safe with Block Site.

Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. Sites from this list avoid all blocking settings.

Sites Blocker extension is going to help you increasing your productivity at workplace. BlockSite easy to install, easy to use and absolutely free extension specially for you! 

Block Site Plus is a PIN code protected website blocker. Scheduled browser-wide site blocking
The "Block Site Plus" is a unique app that allows you to implement scheduled browser-wide site blocking. 
How does it work? You simply protect the site you need with a PIN code. 
This app can also be used for parental control.

Don't hesitate, install Free Site Blocker & Focus Mode and feel the improvement.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
In the vast landscape of the internet, users often encounter content that may not align with their preferences. To address this, we proudly present "Network Purifier," a user-friendly Chrome browser extension designed to empower individuals in shaping their online environment according to their desires. With a focus on simplicity and customization, Network Purifier puts control back into the hands of users.

Key Features:
1. Website and keyword Blocking:
Network Purifier allows users to effortlessly block websites or specific ***s that they find undesirable. Whether it's steering clear of distracting websites or shielding oneself from unwanted content, users have the flexibility to curate their online space.

2. Dynamic Blocking Options:
Users can dynamically block content on the fly, ensuring a seamless and adaptable browsing experience. With a few clicks, they can add or remove items from the block list, tailoring the extension to their evolving preferences.

3. Real-time Configuration:
The extension offers real-time configuration, enabling users to make changes instantly without the need for browser restarts. This ensures a smooth and uninterrupted customization process.

4. Secure Configuration Storage:
The extension prioritizes user privacy by securely storing custom configurations locally. This ensures that user preferences are preserved without compromising sensitive information.
long.ja:
広大なインターネットの世界では、ユーザーは自分の興味に合わないコンテンツに頻繁に遭遇します。この問題に対処するために、私たちは誇り高く「ネットワーククリーンサー」をご紹介します。これはユーザーフレンドリーなChromeブラウザ拡張機能であり、個々のユーザーが自分の要望に基づいてオンライン環境を構築できるように設計されています。ネットワーククリーンサーはシンプルさとカスタマイズ性に焦点を当て、ユーザーに対してネットワーク空間の制御権を取り戻すことを目指しています。

主な機能:

1. ウェブサイトおよびキーワードのブロック
ネットワーククリーンサーは、ユーザーが好ましくないと感じるウェブサイトや特定のキーワードを簡単にブロックできるようにします。気になるウェブサイトから遠ざかるか、望ましくないコンテンツから身を守るために、ユーザーはオンライン空間を好みに合わせてカスタマイズできます。

2. 動的なブロックオプション
ユーザーは動的にコンテンツをリアルタイムでブロックでき、滑らかで適応力のあるブラウジング体験を確保できます。数回のクリックで、ブロックリストからアイテムを追加または削除し、変化する好みに合わせて拡張機能を調整できます。

3. リアルタイム構成
この拡張機能はリアルタイムの構成を提供し、ユーザーはブラウザを再起動せずに即座に変更できます。これにより、カスタマイズプロセスがスムーズで途切れることがありません。

4. 安全な構成の保存
この拡張機能はユーザーのプライバシーを守るために、自分のカスタム構成を安全にローカルに保存します。これにより、ユーザーの好みが損なわれることなく、機密情報が漏洩する心配はありません。
long.ko:
넓은 인터넷 세계에서 사용자는 종종 자신의 흥미에 맞지 않는 콘텐츠를 마주할 수 있습니다. 이 문제를 해결하기 위해 우리는 자부심 있게 "네트워크 정화기"를 소개합니다. 이는 사용자 친화적인 Chrome 브라우저 확장 프로그램으로, 개별 사용자가 자신의 요구에 맞게 온라인 환경을 조성할 수 있도록 설계되었습니다. 네트워크 정화기는 간결함과 맞춤성에 중점을 두어 사용자가 네트워크 공간에 대한 통제력을 다시 확보할 수 있도록 합니다.

주요 기능:

1. 웹사이트 및 키워드 차단:
네트워크 정화기는 사용자가 싫어하는 웹사이트나 특정 키워드를 손쉽게 차단할 수 있도록 합니다. 사용자는 주의를 산만하게 하는 웹사이트를 피하거나 불필요한 콘텐츠로부터 자신을 보호하기 위해 사용자의 취향에 따라 온라인 공간을 맞춤 설정할 수 있습니다.

2. 동적 차단 옵션:
사용자는 콘텐츠를 실시간으로 동적으로 차단하여 브라우징 경험을 부드럽고 적응 가능하게 유지할 수 있습니다. 몇 번의 클릭으로 차단 목록에서 항목을 추가하거나 제거하여 플러그인을 지속적으로 변화하는 사용자 취향에 맞출 수 있습니다.

3. 실시간 구성:
이 확장 프로그램은 실시간 구성을 제공하여 사용자가 브라우저를 다시 시작하지 않고도 즉각적으로 변경할 수 있도록 합니다. 이로써 사용자 정의 과정이 원활하고 중단되지 않도록 보장합니다.

4. 안전한 구성 저장:
이 확장 프로그램은 사용자의 개인 정보를 안전하게 보호하기 위해 사용자 정의 구성을 로컬에 안전하게 저장합니다. 이를 통해 사용자의 선호도가 유지되면서 민감한 정보가 노출되지 않도록 합니다.
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
在广阔的互联网世界中，用户常常会遇到与其兴趣不符的内容。为了解决这个问题，我们自豪地推出了“网络净化器”——一款用户友好的 Chrome 浏览器插件，旨在让个体用户根据自己的需求打造在线环境。网络净化器专注于简单性和定制性，让用户重新掌握了对网络空间的控制权。

主要功能:

1. 网站和关键词屏蔽
网络净化器 允许用户轻松地屏蔽他们认为不喜欢的网站或特定关键词。无论是远离令人分心的网站，还是保护自己免受不必要的内容，用户都可以根据自己的喜好定制在线空间。

2. 动态屏蔽选项
用户可以实时动态地屏蔽内容，确保浏览体验的流畅和适应性。只需点击几下，他们就可以从屏蔽列表中添加或删除项目，使插件适应他们不断变化的喜好。

3. 实时配置
该插件提供实时配置，用户可以即时进行更改，无需重新启动浏览器。这确保了定制过程的顺畅和不间断。

4. 安全配置存储
该插件通过安全地在本地存储自定义配置来保护用户隐私。这确保了用户的喜好得以保留，而不会泄露敏感信息。
